resources.string: Budgetary helps you to track and manage your expenses on daily basis.You can also get a glimpse on your previous expenses by selecting particular date.\nTo add an expense just tap + button on the bottom right corner and fill the required details then and just press add afterwards. No need to worry about managing date and time, application manages it by itself.
To delete an expense data just long press on that, after that you will be asked to press yes on confirmation and by pressing yes that particular expense data would be deleted.
To get a glimpse of your previous expenses just tap Expenses on bottom navigation bar, after that you would be greeted by graphical view of your expenses on that particular day.

As this project is developed, maintained and managed by an individual developer so ads are used to support this project if you want to remove ads just tap RemoveAds in settings and do some one time payment to remove ads.
